metadata.title: CVE-2023-6870 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Applications which spawn a Toast notification in a background thread mayhave obscured fullscreen notifications displayed by Firefox.*This issue only affects Android versions of Firefox and Firefox Focus.*This vulnerability affects Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
